org.apache.solr.util

Class JmxUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.util.JmxUtil

  • public final class JmxUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods to find a MBeanServer. This was factored out from JmxMonitoredMap and can eventually replace the logic used there.
